casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE
v.
GRAYBAR ELECTRIC COMPANY, INC. 153A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2019

Kay Miller Hobart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Graybar Electric Company, Inc.

Ronald D. Williams, II, Assistant Attorney General, For North Carolina Department of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of May 2019 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2019."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 27th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
